author: jochembrouwer
content: Would it make sense to implement the entire spec at this moment, or should I implement parts of it? I think some parts are rather stable, but some other parts (I think especially the parts without an EIP?) are rather unstable at this moment, should I wait for discussion / spec updates / an EIP for that or should I just implement it? Thoughts? ðŸ˜„ ðŸ¤”

author: _shemnon
content: Unstable would be most likley the things we are considering adding like EXTDATACOPY and changes to stack validation. And maybe CREATE3/4.

author: _shemnon
content: But I think it's stable enough that any changes will be deltas not re-writes.  EVMOne and Besu have the stable stuff and some of hte unstable stuff written.

author: jochembrouwer
content: Great ðŸ˜„ Is there also a testsuite currently? Possibly also being passed by both EVMOne and Besu?

author: _shemnon
content: no reliable test suite.  There's some in the reference tests but I'm not sure if they are up to date.
